profile.bio: AI enthusiast and software developer, building the future of human-computer interaction.

persona.userGoals: To brainstorm new project ideas and learn about complex topics.
persona.communicationStyle: Concise with an option for detail

image.name: default-user-01
image.prompt: A modern, minimalist default user avatar. An abstract, gender-neutral silhouette of a person's head and shoulders. The style is flat design with clean lines and soft, rounded shapes. A simple, monochromatic color scheme using a calming blue-gray on a light, neutral background. Centered icon, vector art, 1:1 aspect ratio.

image.name: default-user-02
image.prompt: An abstract user avatar representing potential and identity. The silhouette of a gender-neutral human head and shoulders is filled with a vibrant, glowing nebula of deep blues, purples, and shimmering gold. Within the cosmic pattern, faint, glowing lines suggest a unique neural network, symbolizing the user's unique consciousness. The background is a clean, dark space, making the colorful silhouette the central focus. The image evokes a sense of mystery, creativity, and infinite possibility. Digital art, ethereal, high-detail, 1:1 aspect ratio.
